duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and conduct research studies on business-related topics, including market trends, client background, and regulatory changes.
Responsible for the information gathering, analysis, and presentation of research findings.
Conduct and manage multiple research projects, maintaining storage and retrieval of all research materials.
Review market trends, capital management, and business practices of new ventures.
Set up project and work breakdown structures, and establish and document business processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Economics, Finance, Human Resources, or relevant field (Master's preferred)
